test-case.description: Should correctly import current and latest manifest files

test-case.description: Should apply all necessary upgrades from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0
test-case.name: Upgrade.ps1 Tests.Should apply all necessary upgrades from 6.0.0 to 7.0.0

test-case.description: Should throw an error if manifest paths are not provided
test-case.name: Upgrade.ps1 Tests.Should throw an error if manifest paths are not provided

test-case.description: Should not call upgrade functions if current version equals latest version
test-case.name: Upgrade.ps1 Tests.Should not call upgrade functions if current version equals latest version

test-case.description: Should parse pyproject.toml and extract version, authors, and description

test-case.description: Should create manifest.psd1 with correct data

test-case.description: Should create manifest.psd1 if pyproject.toml exists and is valid
test-case.name: Update-Manifest script tests.Invoke-UpdateManifest function.Should create manifest.psd1 if pyproject.toml exists and is valid

test-case.description: Creates a directory if it does not exist
test-case.name: VenvNew.CreateDirIfNotExist.Creates a directory if it does not exist

failure.message: [0] ParameterBindingValidationException: Cannot bind argument to parameter 'ProjectName' because it is an empty string. [1] PSArgumentNullException: Cannot process argument because the value of argument "path" is null. Change the value of argument "path" to a non-null value.

test-case.description: Does not create a directory if it already exists
test-case.name: VenvNew.CreateDirIfNotExist.Does not create a directory if it already exists

failure.message: [0] ParameterBindingValidationException: Cannot bind argument to parameter 'ProjectName' because it is an empty string. [1] PSArgumentNullException: Cannot process argument because the value of argument "path" is null. Change the value of argument "path" to a non-null value.
